Abstract: Law enforcement officials question security at Louisiana State Penitentiary in Angola in light of a number of life-threatening lapses and attempted escapes, the most recent of which involved the killing of a guard and an inmate; photo (M)
Snippet: Law enforcement officials question security at Louisiana State Penitentiary in Angola in light of a number of life-threatening lapses and attempted escapes, the most recent of which involved the killing of a guard and an inmate; photo (M)
LeadParagraph: Three days after a prison guard and an inmate were killed in an attempted escape from the Louisiana State Penitentiary, law-enforcement officials in the area raised questions today about the security of the infamous prison farm, known as Angola.

Headline.Main: Officials Question Security At Prison Where Guard Died
Headline.PrintHeadline: Officials Question Security At Prison Where Guard Died
